page.title: 16PLUCKLEY GHOSTS 5
page.content: {THE SCHOOLMASTER} did not work in Pluckley, but is thought to have committed suicide about 1920. A small group of children found his body hanging from a tree in Dicky Buss Lane. They watched silently as his body was carried away and he haunts that same lane today. {THE HIGHWAYMAN}has been dead for many years, but the clash of swords that brought his life to an end can still be heard at times at the fatal scene. So too can the agonising scream which he gave as the sword pinned him to the tree trunk. His dark shadowy outline can be seen close to where the tree once stood. (Although the identity of this ghost is not known, one of the Dering family met a similar fate and it is likely this is his ghost).
